Test Name: MACE (Mycobacterium Avium Complex Enzyme-linked Immunoassay), IGE (Immunoglobulin E), and Serum Biochemical Tests
Purpose: To detect Mycobacterium avium complex antigens, quantify Immunoglobulin E levels, and perform routine biochemical analyses on serum samples.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., serum-separator or plain red-top tube)
Equipment: Automated analyzers specific for MACE, IGE, and serum assays; calibrated pipettes
